img_above_text:
![Wukong Thunderclap 49.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6f/Wukong_Thunderclap_49.jpg)
If you take too long to recover and try to rush him, he's likely to fade away and warp backward while immune to damage, so only expend your focus points if you're catching him at the right time.
img_below_text:
He can also form energy around himself by moving his arms in a circle. This will cause all the scattered pages around the floor to form into a whirling tornado, which he'll send at you.
![Wukong Thunderclap 51.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a7/Wukong_Thunderclap_51.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 50 from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Thunderclap 49.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6f/Wukong_Thunderclap_49.jpg)
If you take too long to recover and try to rush him, he's likely to fade away and warp backward while immune to damage, so only expend your focus points if you're catching him at the right time."
            - Following Text: "He can also form energy around himself by moving his arms in a circle. This will cause all the scattered pages around the floor to form into a whirling tornado, which he'll send at you.
![Wukong Thunderclap 51.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a7/Wukong_Thunderclap_51.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong" where the character Wukong is facing an enemy named Non-Void. The enemy is in the process of summoning a whirling tornado of scattered pages by moving his arms in a circular motion, as indicated by the surrounding text. The image captures a critical moment in the battle, emphasizing the need for strategic timing to avoid the enemy's attacks and capitalize on openings.
